result.execSummary:
The defendant Justin J Winterhalter was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine and DNA surcharge are to be paid at $50 per month commencing 05-01-2015 and the first of each month thereafter unitl paid in full or serve 12 days jail with huber as penalty for failure to pay.
DNA surcharge is to be paid inclusive of fine payment plan.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Justin J Winterhalter

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Justin J Winterhalter in court. 

Defendant enters a plea of Guilty to the charge.
Court finds the defendant Guilty of the charge.

Court orders the following:
Fine: $379    
DNA Surcharge:  $200
To be paid at the rate of $50 per month, starting 05/01/15 and the 1st of every month until paid in full.
Alternate: 12  Days in the Waukesha County Jail w/huber (all standard release conditions).
Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.

Defendant Justin J Winterhalter in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court advises of right to an attorney.   Defendant to seek counsel.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
  Hearing scheduled for March 3, 2015 at 09:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Justin J Winterhalter
Current: 2436 N. 50th St., Milwaukee, WI 53210   (Effective: 01-19-2015)
Prior: 7300 N 95th St, Milwaukee, WI 53224
